mapper.update:
UPDATE inspection_e_c
check_id = #{record.checkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
waybill_code = #{record.waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
box_code = #{record.boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
package_barcode = #{record.packageBarcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inspection_e_c_type = #{record.inspectionECType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exception_status = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inspection_type = #{record.inspectionType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exception_type = #{record.exceptionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_code = #{record.createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_site_code = #{record.createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receive_site_code = #{record.receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_code = #{record.updateUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{record.yn,jdbcType=INTEGER},

UPDATE inspection_e_c SET yn=0 WHERE
(create_site_code = #{record.createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND inspection_e_c_type =#{record.inspectionECType,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM inspection_e_c
AND LIMIT ${LIMIT No}
ORDER BY check_id DESC

SELECT
FROM inspection_e_c WHERE exception_status=0 AND yn=1 AND LIMIT 1
